entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
